fields.request: Manual QA: Push CP configuration to EVCS
fields.request_details:
1. Open the CP Configurations admin page and edit a configuration with keys.
2. Update one or more configuration values inline and click "Push configuration to EVCS".
3. Select a local charger, apply the configuration, and confirm the progress table reports success.
4. If a restart is requested, use the Restart chargers button and verify the charger reconnects.
